mapper.sql: id, op_id, sid, ctime, cur_stage, content, next_state, next_degree, next_stage, excepted_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_journal(op_id, sid, ctime, cur_stage, content, next_state, next_degree, next_stage, excepted_date) VALUES (#{eid}, #{sid}, #{ctime}, #{curStage}, #{content}, #{nextState}, #{nextDegree}, #{nextStage}, #{exceptedDate})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_journal WHERE id = #{id} AND valid = 1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_journal WHERE valid = 1

SELECT
FROM tbl_journal WHERE valid = 1 LIMIT ${offset},${size}

SELECT
FROM tbl_journal
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT ${offset}, ${size}
